Experience the power and speed of our separations technology

Our capillary electrophoresis instruments were developed to address your analytical challenges today, while keeping one eye focused firmly on the demands of tomorrow. Whether your lab is performing clone selection, automated and quantitative analysis of biologics, proteomic, metabolomic or genomic research, or food and environmental testing, our is sure to have a state-of-the-art solution for you. Learn more about our capillary electrophoresis instruments, and see why scientists around the world rely on our technology to bring their research into the future.
